page.title: 08Recreation in Kilbarchan
page.content: In{Kilbarchan}and{Brookfield}there are lots of things to do.Both villages have{Public Parks}where people go to have fun.There is a{Bowling green}in Kilbarchan and one in Brookfield. {Badminton,tennis and football}are three sports which you can play in Brookfield and Kilbarchan.In both public parks there is a football pitch.In Kilbarchan there is a private park where football clubs play.A lot of people in the villages have taken up jogging and cycling on the many country roads around Kilbarchan.{ {Kilbarchan Amateur Athletic Club}cater for those who take there running more seriously. { {Kilbarchan Library}is another place where people who enjoy reading like to go.It is a small library but has a lot of interesting information in it.
